column2: an A.M. Eatery////I got the Bella! Bella! Bunny the first time I tried Snooze A.M.
column3: and I would no doubt try that again someday. It was savory and filling--no complaints there. What made my first trip so memorable and worthwhile was the server
column4: Katrina. She was incredibly kind and informative! When I asked her about the pancake of the day
column5: she said what it was and described it. I passed up on it
column6: but at the end of the meal
column7: she gave my table that pancake as a complimentary dessert.
